name: MapboxGeocoder.swift
summary: Mapbox Geocoding API for Swift and Objective-C.
description: MapboxGeocoder.swift makes it easy to connect your iOS, macOS, tvOS, or watchOS application to the Mapbox Geocoding API. MapboxGeocoder.swift exposes the power of the Carmen geocoder through a simple API similar to Core Locationâ€™s CLGeocoder.
